layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x124
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x124
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x108
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 96x34 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 94x32
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 94x28
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 90x28 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]

                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 181x18
                  text run at (3,3) width 181: "Truncated? It should not be!"
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,50) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 755x18
          text run at (0,0) width 472: "According to the rules of CSS, the text above should spill right out of the "
          text run at (471,0) width 284: "table, as it does in the table-less case below:"
